description: Winning three sets after losing the first two. Similar to 'rang san zhui si' (a great comeback after falling far behind).

examples.chinese: 又是一场让二追三的比赛
逆风翻盘,让二追三,惊险的胜利
examples.translation: Turning the tide, a reverse sweep, a thrilling victory.

examples.chinese: 欧冠联赛做客3-2逆转战胜,真的让二追三
examples.translation: In the Champions League away game, winning 3-2 from behind, truly a reverse sweep.
